Clarification! Two *totally different* things are known as "Casper". Casper FFG is a simple "Finality Gadget" for Ethereum 2.0. Casper CBC is an abstract family of "Correct-By-Construction" consensus protocols explored as a candidate design space for the Ethereum 3.0 consensus.

I agree with the conclusion here that the #Ethereum community has woken up to the realities of competition this year, but I have never met anyone in the #ETH community who is threatened by #EOS specifically.  Devs/insiders consider Polkadot/DFINITY/Cosmos as its top competitors.
